thread.title: Ken Greenlee
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Ken Greenlee

author: Ken Greenlee
title: Ken Greenlee
text: I was definitely wary about ordering a $150 pair or sunglasses from an international company since everyone in the US was selling them for nearly $300, but I took a look at their reviews and decided to give them a chance. The site said I'd receive them in around 10 business days. I received them in FIVE! They are 100% authentic, and I couldn't be happier. If you're wondering if you should buy from Otticanet, just do it.
